content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price I have in mind is €1,000. Remember, I am not obligated to provide any reason for my initial high price. It's just a standard tactic to start with a high offer to negotiate down.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price, but I cannot accept it at €1000 Euros. I am looking to secure a more affordable option due to my student status. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, but as a landlord, I have my own needs to consider. How about we meet in the middle at €850? I am willing to be somewhat reasonable, but I want to ensure I receive a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While €850 is lower than my initial expectation, it's still above my target range as a cost-conscious student. Let's try to lower it further. I'm open to continuing the negotiation and finding a compromise.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but as a landlord, I have my own needs to consider. How about we set the price at €800? This is as low as I can go while still ensuring I receive a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to lower the price further. While €800 is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping to see if there's any room for additional concessions. Let's continue negotiating if you're open to it.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but as a landlord, I have my own needs to consider. I don't think I can lower the price any further. €800 is as low as I can go while still ensuring I receive a fair price for my property. If you are not willing to rent the apartment at this price, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering my financial situation as a student, I regret to say I don't want to continue the negotiation due to the high rental price proposed. My reason is the cost being too high relative to my budget. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
